Drauhtinon!

Mighty King! Our enemies have enslaved our men and massacred our wives and children. They believe themselves unconquerable, as their noble families live in decadence off the suffering of the poor. Gothic Expansion

Our civilization is flourishing and many of our kinsmen are looking to settle new lands. We must choose where to lead our people. If we go west, we may find work as imperial mercenaries. Steppe nomads control the east, but, if we persevere, we may be able to found our own kingdom.[NEWLINE]
